description: Support shift scheduler input JSON schema

agents.description: List of agents to consider while generating the schedule

weight.description: Responsibility weight on Monday of week to be scheduled

nextWeekCredit.description: Existing teamwork credit for the next week in hours

availableSlots.description: Availability for each day of the week, Monday to Friday

items.description: Preference legend - 0: unavailable, 1: preferred, 2: available, not preferred, 3: ask-me-nicely, 4: volunteered

startMondayDate.description: Monday date at start of week being scheduled in YYYY-MM-DD format

modelName.description: Short identifier of the teamwork channel for which the scheduler is to be run

longName.description: Full name of the teamwork channel, used in the GCal event summaries

numDays.description: Number of consecutive days to schedule

startHour.description: Daily start time for this teamwork channel

endHour.description: Daily end time for this teamwork channel

useTwos.description: Whether or not 2-slots from agents' preferences may be scheduled

useThrees.description: Whether or not 3-slots from agents' preferences may be scheduled

optimizationTimeout.description: Optimization timeout for constraint solver (in hours)

logSheet.description: Google Spreadsheet ID where logs for this teamwork channel are stored

calendarID.description: ID of Google Calendar where shifts for this teamwork channel are written

useServiceAccount.description: Whether or not to use service account for Google authentication

specialAgentConditions.description: A set of agent-specific conditions to be used in case such exceptions are needed

agentsMaxHoursShift.description: Array specifying maximum shift lengths for particular agents

agentsMinHoursWeek.description: Array specifying minimum hours per week for particular agents

items.description: Minimum hours per week for agent

agentsMaxHoursWeek.description: Array specifying maximum hours per week for particular agents

items.description: Maximum hours per week for agent

agentsFixHours.description: Array containing agents not be scheduled by scheduler, since their shifts are added to the calendar manually

hoursCoverage.description: Specification of minimum to maximum hours to be covered, expressed in terms of totals per non-overlapping day ranges

items.description: Acceptable range of total hours for specific range of days

agentDistribution.description: Specification of how the total covered hours are to be distributed among agents, expressed in terms of non-overlapping time periods

items.description: Number of acceptable agents for a given time period, applicable to the specified range of days

start_day.description: Start day of range this specification applies to

end_day.description: End day of range this specification applies to (inclusive)

start_hour.description: Start hour of time period this specification applies to

end_hour.description: End hour of time period this specification applies to

min_agents.description: Minimum number of agents allowed for this time period

max_agents.description: Maximum number of agents allowed for this time period
